content.rendered:
The “K. L. Thakral Best Paper Award of the IEEE International Symposium on Electronic Systems (IEEE – iSES)” has been established to commemorate the life of Dr. K L Thakral, founding chancellor of Oriental University Indore. He was also instrumental in establishing the IETE Sub Center at Indore.

The best paper will be awarded based on technical excellence. Other criteria such as innovation, contribution to the research community, technical originality, and clarity of writing will also be considered.

The award will include a cash prize of INR 5,000.

iSES 2022 – Best Paper Awards

  • Title: Platoon Formation Based on DSRC Basic Safety Messages
    Authors: Omkar Dokur, Gustavo Olenscki and Srinivas Katkoori (University of South Florida, USA)
  • Title: The Chaotic-Based Challenge Feed Mechanism for Arbiter Physical Unclonable Functions (APUFs) With Enhanced Reliability in IoT Security
    Raveendra Podeti (National Institute of Technology Warangal, India); Patri Sreeharirao (National Institute of Technology, Warangal, India); Pullakandam Muralidhar (NIT Warangal, India)
  • Title: Security Vs Design Cost of Signature Driven Security Methodologies for Reusable Hardware IP Core
    Authors: Rahul Chaurasia (IIT Indore, India); Anirban Sengupta (Indian Institute of Technology Indore, India)
  • K L Thakral Best Paper Award
    Title: WiZ-BMS: A Hybrid Wireless Network-On-Chip Design With Fully Adaptive Routing
    Authors: Munshi Mostafijur Rahaman (Indian Institution Engineering Science and Technology Shibpur, India); Prasun Ghosal (Indian Institute of Engineering Science and Technology, Shibpur, India & University of North Texas, USA); Chandan Giri (Bengal Engineering & Science University, Shibpur, India)
